<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the setting for writing mails to the history with the parameter specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"writeMailToHistoryAuto":{"description":"Defines if the mails are written to the history automatically or not","type":"boolean"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated setting for writing mails to the history (true or false)","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
